description.value:
Worn on the back as a harness or on top of a Power Armour Power Pack. Once per combat as a Full Action, character can cause all those not dedicated to Slaanesh within 6d10 metres to make a -20 Willpower Test or become stunned for 1 Round per Degree of Failiure. They also allow Character to reroll initiative at start of any combat round.

Requirements

Must be Dedicated to Slaanesh to use. Can't use at the same time as a Noise Marine Doom Siren Weapon, as neither work in proximity of the other. Heretical.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
